vehicles module¶

Responsible for keeping track of vehicles in scene and individual vehicles.

class vehicles.Vehicle(id, bbox, class_name)¶

Bases: object

A vehicle object that stores information about vehicles

prev20Bboxand10AreaAppend(bbox)¶

record of previous 20 bounding boxes of that vehicle and previous 10 areas of vehicles that is required for other modules. :param bbox: bbox to calculate area from and append.

class vehicles.Vehicles(detection_object)¶

Bases: object

Vehicles class is responsible for overall vehicles seen in the scene.

getVehicleById(id)¶

To return vehicle object using id :param id: vehicle object to get id of :return: vehicle object

register()¶

creating a vehicle object if it is not present in vehicles in scene - bounding box is updated if it is already present.

Parking, Lane and Retrogress Violation Detection
